DOC.brief_title: Study Streptococcus Pneumoniae Nose Throats Infants With Acute Otitis Media
DOC.criteria: Infants age 6 24 month Presenting AOM ( ear infection ) Patients must receive antibiotic therapy within past 7 day . Other inclusion applies .
